description: This file implements the main Notes page component for a notes management frontend. It fetches notes data, displays a list, provides search/filter functionality, and allows deletion of notes with UI interactions.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fetches notes data from the API, sorts it, and updates the component state.

methods.name: onDelete
methods.description: Deletes a note after user confirmation, updates state and UI messages.

methods.name: filtered
methods.description: Filters notes based on search query input.
